amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds from being used to pay any United States contribution to the United Nations or any affiliated agency of the United Nations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 259 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 259 (Roll no. 320).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
